sentences.english: I'm confused. Should I go to an optometrist or ophthalmologist for my eye exam?
sentences.chinese: 我應該看驗光師還是眼科醫師，作眼鏡查抄時？

sentences.english: The optician says that my vision is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 驗光師說我的視力非常好。

sentences.english: You were still at your optometrist appointment.
sentences.chinese: 你仍舊在你驗光師約見的地方。

sentences.english: You will help recruit the best optometrists for our new stores;
sentences.chinese: 您將協助我們的新店招募優秀，專業的驗光師。
驗光師擁有絕對的選擇權。

sentences.english: So he decides to go into town to see if he can find an optometrist.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他決議進入鎮看到，假如他能找到一個驗光師。

sentences.english: An optician is qualified to examine your eyes and prescribe glasses.
sentences.chinese: 驗光師有資格檢查你的眼睛及配眼鏡。

sentences.english: Please wait a moment and our optometrist will be ready to see you.
sentences.chinese: 請等一下，我們的驗光師馬上就來看你。

sentences.english: She only wears gltest to read.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛驗光師她惟有看書時才戴眼鏡。

sentences.english: They go on to work in labs under the direction of ophthalmologists and optometrists.
sentences.chinese: 學生將來在眼科醫生和驗光師的指導在實驗室工作。

sentences.english: Optometrists are well- placed to provide a solution to this problem, with appropriate training.
sentences.chinese: 而受到適當培訓的驗光師正好可以解決這一問題。

sentences.english: He served as an optometrist in a big hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家大醫院擔任驗光師。

sentences.english: If you need glasses, you should see an optometrist.
sentences.chinese: 若是你要配眼鏡，你要找去驗光師。

sentences.english: The optician said I needed new glasses.
sentences.chinese: 驗光師說我需要配新眼鏡。

sentences.english: The optician said I needed new glasses.
sentences.chinese: 驗光師說我需要配副新眼鏡。

sentences.english: I tried to call you but your mom said you were still at your optometrist appointment.
sentences.chinese: 我想打電話給你，你媽媽說你還在和你的驗光師約會。
